entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -9.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 06:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -9.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -12.7°C
Wind: SE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Flurries beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming north 30 in the morning then becoming west 30 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
